Package cams.dashboards.participant_controllers

Class StudentParticipationController

java.lang.Object
cams.dashboards.participant_controllers.StudentParticipationController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ParticipationController, Serializable
public class StudentParticipationController extends Object implements ParticipationController, Serializable
Implements the ParticipationController interface, handling actions related to camp registration and deregistration. This class applies the business logic to perform these actions, such as checking camp availability.

    • StudentParticipationController

  • Method Details

    • deregister

      public void deregister(User user, String campName)
      Deregisters a user from a specified camp.

      Handles logic to ensure a user can only deregister from camps they are registered for. Adds the user to a banned list of the camp preventing future registrations.

      Specified by:
      deregister in interface ParticipationController
      Parameters:
      user - The User who is deregistering.
      campName - The name of the camp from which the user is deregistering.

    • register

      public void register(User user, String campName)
      Registers a user to a specified camp.

      Handles logic to ensure a user can register for available camps and not for closed or over camps. Additionally, checks for date clashes and allows users to join the camp committee if vacancies exist.

      Specified by:
      register in interface ParticipationController
      Parameters:
      user - The User who is registering.
      campName - The name of the camp to which the user is registering.

    • viewAllCamps

      public int viewAllCamps(User user, String attribute, boolean ascending)
      Displays camp information for all camps visible and available to the user
      Specified by:
      viewAllCamps in interface ParticipationController
      Returns:
      The number of camps displayed.
